name: places/ChIJXehL7JtZwokRTsltvhonZa8
adrFormatAddress: 308 5th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
During my consultation with Dr. Doshi, he explained the surgery very thoroughly and my personal limitation due to scar tissue from my previous surgery. I prepared myself with a lot of questions and he answered them very patiently. I felt I can put my full trust in him. The surgery took about 5 hours and I was worried about anesthetic since I had bad experiences from previous surgeries, but this time after I woke 10-15 minutes I was back to normal, no dizziness or nausea. 3 days later the tape was removed and I could see that my incision follows the natural
contour of my face and won’t be visible after a couple of months. I went back to work 1 week later. Now after 6 weeks after the surgery, the incision is almost invisible, little bit of swelling is still there around my ears. Dr. Doshi is very carrying, he kept in touch and made sure I was following all the post op instructions and taking care of my incisions properly. I think I could not have chosen a better doctor for my face and neck lift. His work is extremely precise and nothing is overdone. My face looks very natural. I am very happy with the result, which is beyond my expectation, especially on my neck. Well done Dr. Doshi. Thank you very much.

originalText.text:
I feel fortunate to have found Maxim Facial Aesthetics for an eyelid procedure.  My entire experience was not only positive, but has exceeded my expectation. I highly recommend Maxim Facial Aesthetics without reservations.  I was lucky enough to be placed in the hands of Dr. Doshi.  He is very experienced and has an impeccable bedside manner.  I took the liberty to do some research prior to my appointment; and found that he has excellent credentials.  An expert in his field.
Regarding the procedure:  prior to the procedure I had an initial consultation that was most informative (because it helped me know exactly what to expect).  Complete instructions were given to me pre and post op.  Dr. Doshi and his staff assured me that they would be assessable on a regular basis (and they were the entire time!).  Dr. Doshi and the staff made phone calls to follow up (in the event I had concerns or questions).  A week after the procedure, I returned to remove the stitches. I had experienced no pain or bruising. A week after the stitches were removed there were no scaring.  My face has shown the subtle changes that I anticipated.  I consider this procedure a success. I am pleased with the results.  What made this experience positive is that I was and still am impressed with the care that I received by Dr. Doshi and his staff.

originalText.text: I had a Double Chin Liposuction procedure done by Dr Doshi. The first day, that I had my consultation with Dr Doshi, I knew wright then and there that I had made the right choice. He was very thorough about explaining  the procedure to me. I scheduled  the procedure the second he finished his consultation with me. It's been several weeks since I had my Double Chin liposuction, and I can't tell you enough of how Dr Doshi, exceeded all my expectations. He, truly is the best. I strongly recommend Dr Doshi, and he's staff to anyone who is thinking of doing Liposuction, or any facial cosmetics. Don't hesitate, just do it.......

originalText.text: Absolutely loved going here. I felt that both Dr.Doshi and Ilona we're committed to making me happy and wanted me to feel comfortable during the entire process. I have been to plastic surgeons in the past and always felt like they had their own ideas of what i should do. With Dr.Doshi he always asked me "what do you think?" and "What so you want to do?". These questions made me feel at ease and excited. I had a very positive experience here and think Dr.Doshi and his team did a great job!

originalText.text: I got my procedure done in October. Dr Doshi is an expert in his field.There were two nurses and one head nurse helping him who were very friendly and cooperative. It was a pleasant experience and I am very pleased with the results.
